dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4001 IH: To prohibit arms sales, cybersecurity sales, and military sales with the People’s Republic of China and the Chinese Communist Party.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Santos introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit arms sales, cybersecurity sales, and military sales with the People’s Republic of China and the Chinese Communist Party.

section.header: Prohibition on arms sales, cybersecurity sales, and military sales with the People’s Republic of China and the Chinese Communist Party
section.text: No arms sales, cybersecurity sales, or military sales may be entered into with the People’s Republic of China or the Chinese Communist Party by—

paragraph.text: any person using funds received under a contract or other agreement from the United States Government.
